name: Jumpy Cube (Platinum Monster)
description:
Hello,

Avoid the green and red cubes, Collect the Blue and purple.

Use the Jump button on your bottom left to jump.

I am Platinum...Platinum Monster

I made This game In around a week.One of the first Games I ever made on Unity.I have made games on scratch a drag and drop software before.I spent about 10 hours making this game.This games is a low poly game no facy graphics.

I put alot of hard work. This would be easier to make if I wasn't a beginneer.I will try to make better games.I spent alot of time So i hope you enjoy.

Thank You :)
